text: @cnnbrk The Hydroxychloroquine is an immunosuppressive drug. What’s killing ppl, is the overreaction of the immune system, especially in the lungs, to Coronavirus. Stop the overreaction, lungs don’t fill up with fluid, no vents needed, body has time to develop antibodies.
